title: Level 7 Lux
body: Riot please, I have been trying for 2 weeks to get level 7 Lux. I have all 3 level 7 tokens but just not enough blue essence, I have 599/600 of the required amount. So I beg you, please just give me the one blue essence if possible I have been grinding Ip for 2 weeks.{{champion:99}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
